div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode where concept is-a _MemberRoleType

div.p: This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li:
Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode
CodeDisplayDefinition
_MemberRoleTypeMemberRoleTypeTypes of membership for Role code "MBR"

description.value: A role type that is used to further qualify an entity playing a role where the role class attribute is set to RoleClassMember.
